survey_brief: This survey aims to understand how workplace noise levels impact employee productivity and overall satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How would you describe the typical noise level in your primary workspace?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to ensure clarity and ease of response.

script.question_text: How would you describe the typical noise level in your primary workspace?

questions.question_text: How often do you find workplace noise distracting?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for consistent measurement.

script.question_text: How often do you find workplace noise distracting?

questions.question_text: What types of noise are most disruptive to your work? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture varied disruptions.

script.question_text: What types of noise are most disruptive to your work? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: If you selected 'Other' above, please specify the type of noise.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended field to capture unique responses.

script.question_text: If you selected 'Other' above, please specify the type of noise.

questions.question_text: How does workplace noise affect your productivity?
questions.client_notes: Use a balanced scale to capture both positive and negative effects.

script.question_text: How does workplace noise affect your productivity?

questions.question_text: What strategies do you use to cope with workplace noise? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Talk to colleagues about reducing noise
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to identify common strategies.

script.question_text: What strategies do you use to cope with workplace noise? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Talk to colleagues about reducing noise

questions.question_text: If you selected 'Other' above, please specify your strategy.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended field to capture unique strategies.

script.question_text: If you selected 'Other' above, please specify your strategy.

questions.question_text: What additional measures could your employer take to reduce workplace noise?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather actionable feedback.

script.question_text: What additional measures could your employer take to reduce workplace noise?
